alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:59PM MDT until June 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARDING...NORTHEASTERN BUTTE...NORTH CENTRAL MEADE AND WESTERN PERKINS COUNTIES... At 559 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Prairie City to 5 miles west of Date to 9 miles southwest of Mud Butte, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Date, Prairie City, Bison, Owen Lake, Maurine and northwestern Shadehill Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
